name: Blood Day
description: Indie horror from the first person is waiting for you, full of mysteries and secret places. Gameplay challenges the most experienced player! Can you do it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Support for all modern processors Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Support for all modern video cards Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: For all sound cards
